Category:Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures episodes

nodes.text: "Han Solo - Galaxy's Best Smuggler" is the ninth episode of Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures. It premiered on the StarWarsKids.com and Disney Now websites on December 7, 2018.

At Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina, Han Solo introduces himself as the captain of the Millennium Falcon. The video then shows a wide landscape shot of Han standing outside his ship. A squad of stormtroopers armed with a tripod-mounted blaster cannon open fire on the Falcon at Docking Bay 94. As the ship flies away, Han fires back and shoots at least two stormtroopers.

As the Falcon flies into space, Han tells the viewer that this is the ship that made the Kessel Run in less than twelve parsecs. There is a flashback of the Falcon escaping a Summa-verminoth near a gravity well in the Akkadese Maelstrom. The Falcn jumps into hyperspace. The video then shows the Falcon outrunning an Imperial Star Destroyer and TIE fighters above Tatooine.

Returning to the present, Han tells Luke Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi that she is fast enough for the "old man." Ben says they would like to avoid any Imperial entanglements. Han says this is the real trick as the camera flashes to a dogfight between the Falcon and TIEs.
